Title.evidence: The Carotid Revascularization, Endarterectomy vs. Stenting Trial (CREST)

Trial_Design.evidence: randomized to both treatment arms in a 1:1 ratio

Intervention.evidence: comparing the efficacy of carotid artery stenting (CAS) to carotid endarterectomy (CEA)

Objective.evidence: The primary aim is to contrast the efficacy of CAS versus CEA

Method_Outcome.evidence: preventing stroke, myocardial infarction, and all-cause mortality during a 30-day peri-procedural period

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: randomized to both treatment arms in a 1:1 ratio

Funding.evidence: Sponsored by the National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke (NINDS)
